articles.title: Judge orders Trump administration to provide due process to some migrants deported to El Salvador

articles.description: The US president said that he discussed Ukraine's drone attack, which destroyed more than 40 Russian warplanes, with Vladimir Putin during an hour and 15 minute long phone call.
articles.content:
